function.name: search_and_summarize_web
function.description: Performs a web search and summarizes the results

query.description: Web search terms or questions to be answered and summarized

function.name: query_io_table_for_knn_topics
function.description: Queries the input and output table to find KNN topics

topics.description: The topic, or topics, to query the io table for

max_items.description: Maximum number of similar topics to return, default is 5
